snippet: The Justice Department filed an antitrust lawsuit charging that Apple and others colluded to raise the price of e-books in 2010. Several publishers have agreed to a settlement.
abstract: The Justice Department filed an antitrust lawsuit charging that Apple and others colluded to raise the price of e-books in 2010. Several publishers have agreed to a settlement.

headline.main: Justice Dept. Sues Apple and Publishers Over E-Book Pricing; 3 Publishers Settle
headline.print_headline: U.S. Sues Apple and Publishers Over E-Book Pricing
